## Panel-survey of War-induced Russian Emigrants

I am a principal investigator in [OutRush project](https://outrush.io/eng). This is a panel survey of Russian emigrants who left Russia after February 24, 2022. To date, the project has collected data in three waves, with a total of 10,000 respondents residing in more than 100 countries. The project involves a number of experiments as well as qualitative interviews.


## Intimate Partner Violence in Russia

I am a principal investigator in [Violence Monitor project](https://violencemonitor.org/) -- a series of surveys on intimate partner violence conducted in Russia in 2021. The project includes several survey and field experiments aimed at enhancing the disclosure of intimate partner violence.
